item.title: Private Yellowstone Tour: ICONIC Sites, Wildlife, Family Friendly Hikes + lunch
item.description: Avoid crowds and maximize your wildlife-viewing experience on this private Yellowstone tour led by a naturalist guide. Journey through Yellowstone National Park while making frequent stops for wildlife encounters as well as scenic and secluded hikes that lead to some of Yellowstone's best destinations and lesser-known geysers and hot springs that lie off the beaten path.

image.alt: Private Yellowstone Tour: ICONIC Sites, Wildlife, Family Friendly Hikes + lunch

item.title: Lower Loop Van Tour from West Yellowstone: Grand Prismatic and Old Faithful
item.description: Explore Yellowstone's famous Lower Loop the easy way on a small-group van tour that takes you to highlights like the Old Faithful geyser, Shadow Canyon, Yellowstone Lake, and the Grand Prismatic Hot Springs. Leave the driving to a professional and ride with a small group of fellow travelers, stopping along the way for short hikes, wildlife watching, and to admire the best scenic overlooks.

image.alt: Lower Loop Van Tour from West Yellowstone: Grand Prismatic and Old Faithful

item.title: Exclusive Private Yellowstone Adventure: Explore The Lower Loop
item.description: Explore Yellowstone on your schedule on a private, boutique tour with a personal guide and driver who knows how to capture the best views and see the most wildlife. Stop wherever you want, and take home high-quality snapshots of your group against the park's magnificent backdrops thanks to your guide's photography skills.

image.alt: Exclusive Private Yellowstone Adventure: Explore The Lower Loop

item.title: Yellowstone National Park - Full-Day Lower Loop Tour from West Yellowstone
item.description: The Yellowstone National Park is a UNESCO World Heritage site and the oldest national park in the United States. On this full-day, small-group tour, take in highlights such as the Mud Pots, and the iconic Old Faithful geyser; enjoy spectacular views over the Grand Canyon; and look out for native wildlife including grizzly bears, grey wolves, and bison.

image.alt: Yellowstone National Park - Full-Day Lower Loop Tour from West Yellowstone

item.title: Yellowstone Full Day Private Tour
item.description: Yellowstone National Park can be overwhelming at first, so get a great introduction on a private, full-day tour that combines driving and hiking and is tailored around your group's interests. Leave the guidebook behind and let expert naturalist guides show you the best of West Yellowstone, from erupting geysers and bubbling hot springs to magnificent canyons and waterfalls.

image.alt: Yellowstone Full Day Private Tour

item.title: Private Yellowstone Tour: Hot Springs, Wildlife, & Waterfalls
item.description: Spend an unforgettable day with a guide who’ll take care of everything from your route to your lunch to wildlife safety. See Yellowstone National Park like a seasoned expert thanks to a tour leader passionate about making your trip to the park the best it can be, from wildlife spotting to picking you up in a comfortable vehicle.

image.alt: Private Yellowstone Tour: Hot Springs, Wildlife, & Waterfalls

item.title: Private Yellowstone Wildlife Sightseeing Tour
item.description: If you're hoping to see wildlife in Yellowstone National Park, increase your chances of spotting magnificent animals like wolves, elk, pronghorn sheep, birds of prey, and even bears on this private wildlife tour. It can be daunting to navigate the massive park on your own, but your dedicated driver and guide knows all the best habitats to increase your chances of wildlife sightings on this full-day tour.

image.alt: Private Yellowstone Wildlife Sightseeing Tour

item.title: Upper Loop Tour and Lamar Valley from West Yellowstone with Lunch
item.description: Skip the hassles of navigating Yellowstone’s traffic, hoping you’ll spot some incredible wildlife off the road. With this tour, your driver’s at the wheel, taking you from bear hotspot to elk hangout and beyond—aka the Madison River, Lamar Valley, and more. With warm drinks, lunch, binoculars, and spotting scopes provided, you’ll get a guaranteed adventure with a touch of ease and luxury.

image.alt: Upper Loop Tour and Lamar Valley from West Yellowstone with Lunch

item.title: Private Yellowstone Old Faithful and Lower Loop Tour
item.description: From Old Faithful to Fountain Paint Pot, you’ll see Yellowstone National Park highlights on this full-day tour from Island Park or West Yellowstone. Exploring with a personal guide who knows the landscape, wildlife, and secret spots is a great way to discover the national park's most gorgeous places. Using a spotting scope and binoculars, watch for bison, elk, bears, and wolves as you make your way through Hayden Valley.

image.alt: Private Yellowstone Old Faithful and Lower Loop Tour

item.title: Private Upper Loop Tour of Yellowstone National Park
item.description: Ideal for travelers with limited time in the region, this private full-day excursion lets you skip the time-consuming group tours and see more of Yellowstone Lower Loop than you likely could alone. Visit geysers, grand canyons, and take short hikes at your own pace, plus stop at Old Faithful during this comprehensive visit.

image.alt: Private Upper Loop Tour of Yellowstone National Park

item.title: Special Yellowstone “Hot Spots” Deals From West Yellowstone
item.description: Discover the natural beauty of Yellowstone National Park on a small-group, full-day guided tour. Learn more about the park's geothermal sites and visit the top landmarks of the lower loop, including the mud volcanoes, the Grand Canyon, the Norris Geyser Basin, and the Old Faithful Geyser. There are plenty of stops for snapping photos and admiring the scenery—you may even spot the bears and bison that roam the area.

image.alt: Special Yellowstone “Hot Spots” Deals From West Yellowstone

item.title: Yellowstone National Park Self-Guided Driving Audio Tour
item.description:
Purchase one tour per car. Everyone can listen at the same time!
Experience the raw power and beauty of nature at Yellowstone National Park. This enormous volcanic caldera has captured the American imagination for decades thanks to its explosive geysers, prismatic hot springs, and astonishing waterfalls. Home to some of the only wild bison and wolves on the continent, this park can’t be missed.
The tour can begin at any of the park’s entrances. Due to poor signal in the park, download BEFORE arrival and use OFFLINE MODE. Note road closures on park website.
After booking, check your email to download the separate Audio Tour Guide App by Action, enter your unique password, and access your tour. These steps require good internet/Wi-Fi access. From there, follow the audio instructions and the route.
New, extra validity — now yours for an entire year! Use multiple times over multiple trips!
This isn't an entrance ticket. Check opening hours before your visit.

image.alt: Yellowstone National Park Self-Guided Driving Audio Tour

item.title: Private Yellowstone Tour: Wildlife Safari + Waterfalls w/ lunch!
item.description:
Create the experience of a lifetime on this FULLY private wildlife safari! We take care of the trip planning, photos/videos, lunch, driving, & guiding so you do not have to.
Enjoy unparalleled opportunities to observe wildlife, learn about the region's history, & take in magnificent landscapes.
This tour is for wildlife lovers! We have spotting scopes, binoculars & know where to find wildlife. Visit the Lamar Valley, several waterfalls, Mammoth Hot Springs, & more.
If you would like a tour of the "Lower Loop," where iconic sites such as Grand Prismatic & Old Faithful are located, we offer those too!
Our guides are CPR & Wilderness First Aid certified.
We are an authorized permittee of Yellowstone National Park.
*The park is set to close November 4th, but snow can cause the Lower Loop to be inaccessible before that date. If that occurs, we can start the tour in Gardner, MT.

image.alt: Private Yellowstone Tour: Wildlife Safari + Waterfalls w/ lunch!

item.title: Full Day Yellowstone Nat'l Park Tour From West Yellowstone
item.description:
Yellowstone National Park is one of America’s great treasures. This full day safari will show off the highlights of this incredible place; volcanic thermal features, giant waterfalls, diverse wildlife, the Grand Canyon of the Yellowstone, and Yellowstone Lake.
Throughout the day we will drive scenic roads, walk historic boardwalks, enjoy the peace of natural landscapes and use our optics to view wildlife. Your guide is your driver, and their goal is to cover as many of Yellowstone’s famous features as they can in a day.
The guides at Yellowstone Safari Co. will make every effort to showcase as many highlights as possible, and will structure the day around making your experience a memorable one. They will take current road conditions, weather, seasonality, and your personal interests into consideration as they move through the park.
Highlights Old Faithful & Grand Prismatic Spring Lower and Upper Falls, Grand Canyon of the Yellowstone Geysers, Hot Springs, Mudpots & Fumaroles

image.alt: Full Day Yellowstone Nat'l Park Tour From West Yellowstone

item.title: Grand Teton and Yellowstone Self-Guided Driving Tours Bundle
item.description: A great opportunity for those who don't wish to be tied down to a structured tour, this self-guided driving tour lets you explore Grand Teton and Yellowstone National Park at your own pace. Leisurely drive from place to place or see as much as you can in one day. Visit geysers, peaks, and hot springs. Keep a look out for bison as you indulge in the serenity of glacial lakes, delve into the history of homesteads, and conquer mountain passes.

image.alt: Grand Teton and Yellowstone Self-Guided Driving Tours Bundle

item.title: Yellowstone Lower Loop VIP Full-Day Private Tour with Lunch
item.description: Explore the first National Park in the world with our Adventure Guides who will show you the best ways to see the park’s stunning sites while you simply relax and take in the views. We’ll focus on Yellowstone’s Lower Loop, including the Hayden Valley, the Grand Prismatic Spring, Old Faithful and Gibbon Falls. Pick-up and drop-off is at your hotel with a provided lunch. Single travelers are welcome to join groups.

image.alt: Yellowstone Lower Loop VIP Full-Day Private Tour with Lunch

item.title: Yellowstone Lower Loop VIP Full-Day Private Tour with Lunch
item.description: Leave the planning of a Yellowstone adventure up to us and you'll have a spectacular day to savor in the world’s first National Park while you relax and take in the views. We’ll focus on Yellowstone’s Lower Loop, including the Hayden Valley, the Grand Prismatic Spring, Old Faithful and Gibbon Falls. Pick-up and drop-off are at your hotel with a provided lunch. Single travelers are welcome to join groups.

image.alt: Yellowstone Lower Loop VIP Full-Day Private Tour with Lunch

item.title: North Yellowstone Day Tour (Lamar Valley) Private Day Tour
item.description: The world’s first national park—and the world’s largest supervolcano—deserves more than just a scenic drive. Exploring the Upper Loop with a personal photographer and guide, you’ll witness Mammoth Hot Springs, scout for wildlife in the Lamar Vally, gaze upon Tower Fall, and experience the grandeur of Grand Canyon of the Yellowstone, all in one spectacular day.

image.alt: North Yellowstone Day Tour (Lamar Valley) Private Day Tour

item.title: Yellowstone Full Day Private Hike
item.description: If you're unsure where to start in Yellowstone, make the most of your time inside the treasured national park with a private, full-day hike led by naturalist guides with advanced degrees in outdoor and sustainability education. Instead of guessing or spending hours researching trails, let these expert hikers design an insider’s itinerary tailored just for your group’s interests and abilities.

image.alt: Yellowstone Full Day Private Hike

item.title: Private Yellowstone Lower Loop Tour
item.description: Make the most of your time in Wyoming on a private tour of Yellowstone National Park’s Lower Loop, with round–trip transport from the doorstep of your Jackson Hole accommodation. In addition to navigating through remote locations, your guide explains and highlights the area’s thermal features, from erupting geysers to river waterfalls. The day includes a full picnic lunch and the option to customize the itinerary to fit your interests.

image.alt: Private Yellowstone Lower Loop Tour

item.title: Wildlife and Waterfalls
item.description: For those who are interested in exploring more and driving less, join this tour to explore Yellowstone's wild Hayden Valley and impressive waterfalls. We'll spend more time out of the vehicle than in as we seek bison, elk, bears, and wolves in Hayden Valley, and along the shores of Yellowstone Lake. We'll also do some hikes to the Lower Falls at the Grand Canyon of the Yellowstone and Gibbon Falls.

image.alt: Wildlife and Waterfalls

item.title: Private Yellowstone Luxury Cadillac Tours From West Yellowstone
item.description: Discover the natural wonders of Yellowstone National Park from the comfort of a luxury BMW or Cadillac. Relax and admire the views as your guide drives you to dramatic viewpoints and wildlife-watching hotspots. Follow the Firehole Lake Drive; hop out to see the Mud Volcano, Norris Geyser Basin and Old Faithful; and enjoy incredible views over Yellowstone Grand Canyon.

image.alt: Private Yellowstone Luxury Cadillac Tours From West Yellowstone

item.title: Yellowstone Full Day Winter Tour (With Optional Hike or Snowshoe)
item.description: Explore Montana’s Yellowstone in the wintertime with a master naturalist as your guide, with optional hike or snowshoe. You’ll be taken to three areas of the park: Mammoth Hot Springs, Lamar Valley, and Calcite Springs overlook, where you have the option to hike to the overlook and check out the hot springs. This is a full day experience, and lunch is included.

image.alt: Yellowstone Full Day Winter Tour (With Optional Hike or Snowshoe)

item.title: 2-Day Private Yellowstone Tour(Lower and Upper Loops w Iconic Sites) w Lunch
item.description: Explore the first National Park in the world with our Adventure Guides who will show you the best of the park’s stunning sites while you simply relax and take in the views. This 2-day tour includes the iconic sites on both the Lower and Upper Loops, including the Grand Prismatic Spring, Hayden Valley, Old Faithful, and Yellowstone Lake. Daily pick-up and drop-off at your hotel with a provided breakfast and lunch.

image.alt: 2-Day Private Yellowstone Tour(Lower and Upper Loops w Iconic Sites) w Lunch
